mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN recycle_bin.STATUS = 'ToBeRecycled' AND vm_cloud_disk.STATUS != 'deleted' THEN 'ToBeRecycled' ELSE vm_cloud_disk.STATUS END AS status, vm_cloud_disk.*, cloud_account.NAME AS account_name, cloud_account.platform AS platform, vm_cloud_server.instance_name AS instance_name, CASE WHEN org_workspace.type = "workspace" THEN org_workspace.id ELSE NULL END AS workspace_id, CASE WHEN org_workspace.type = "workspace" THEN org_workspace.NAME ELSE NULL END AS workspace_name, org_workspace.organization_id, org_workspace.organization_name FROM vm_cloud_disk LEFT JOIN cloud_account ON vm_cloud_disk.account_id = cloud_account.id LEFT JOIN vm_cloud_server ON vm_cloud_disk.instance_uuid = vm_cloud_server.instance_uuid AND vm_cloud_disk.account_id = vm_cloud_server.account_id LEFT JOIN org_workspace ON vm_cloud_disk.source_id = org_workspace.id LEFT JOIN recycle_bin ON vm_cloud_disk.id = recycle_bin.resource_id AND recycle_bin.resource_type = 'DISK' AND recycle_bin.STATUS = 'ToBeRecycled' ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT CASE WHEN recycle_bin.STATUS = 'ToBeRecycled' AND vm_cloud_disk.STATUS != 'deleted' THEN 'ToBeRecycled' ELSE vm_cloud_disk.STATUS END AS status, vm_cloud_disk.*, vm_cloud_server.instance_name, cloud_account.`name` AS account_name, cloud_account.platform, CASE WHEN org_workspace.type = "workspace" THEN org_workspace.id ELSE NULL END AS workspace_id, CASE WHEN org_workspace.type = "workspace" THEN org_workspace.NAME ELSE NULL END AS workspace_name, org_workspace.organization_id, org_workspace.organization_name FROM vm_cloud_disk LEFT JOIN vm_cloud_server ON vm_cloud_disk.instance_uuid = vm_cloud_server.instance_uuid AND vm_cloud_disk.account_id = vm_cloud_server.account_id AND vm_cloud_server.instance_status != 'Deleted' LEFT JOIN cloud_account ON vm_cloud_disk.account_id = cloud_account.id LEFT JOIN org_workspace ON vm_cloud_disk.source_id = org_workspace.id LEFT JOIN recycle_bin ON vm_cloud_disk.id = recycle_bin.resource_id AND recycle_bin.resource_type = 'DISK' AND recycle_bin.STATUS = 'ToBeRecycled' WHERE vm_cloud_disk.id = #{id}
